text: Usui Sadamitsu is a legendary male or female warrior of the mid-Heian period of Japanese history. Usui Sadamitsu may also refer to modern fictional characters: * Usui Sadamitsu, a young male warrior character in the 2004–05 Otogi Zoshi (anime) television series * Usui Sadamitsu, a female warrior character in the 2003 Otogi 2: Immortal Warriors hack and slash action game
title: Usui Sadamitsu (disambiguation)
